Articles.Content:
I can confirm, that in windows 10, I can run chrome with ease and on the forums it seems great!

![23YJ0id.png](http://i.imgur.com/23YJ0id.png)

WOOO WINDOWS 10 ROCKS
Insider preview? Why does the recycling bin look like that? What's the circle on the task bar what's the object next to the circle on the task bar? (Sorry)
Does not every version of Windows this century run Chome?
Te biggest question of all dies it have internet explorer?

Well, you can also view and post on the forums well with Tails on the 'TOR Browser' version of Firefox.

Is there anything particularly interesting, good, or different, in your view, about Windows 10? Perhaps I should just try it myself.
I find the fact that Win 10 can run Chrome entirely unremarkable.
Can I put the taskbar down, where it belongs? ![-_-](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_sleep.png)

> 
> Can I put the taskbar down, where it belongs? ![-_-](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_sleep.png)

Of course, for some reason OP thinks his taskbar isn't afraid of heights and decided to hang him up there. D:

> 
> Insider preview? Why does the recycling bin look like that? What's the circle on the task bar what's the object next to the circle on the task bar? (Sorry)

Insider Preview is for a group of people who signed up for the program.

It's the new icon.

Cortana. A Siri for Windows, came default

> 
> Well, you can also view and post on the forums well with Tails on the 'TOR Browser' version of Firefox.
> Is there anything particularly interesting, good, or different, in your view, about Windows 10? Perhaps I should just try it myself.

Well, it's quite a bit better than windows 8 (or 8.1) and it seems like a great OS! Project Spartan (the new internet explorer) ROCKS!
Cortana? Halo

> 
> Cortana? Halo

Yes, Microsoft made Halo and they carried the name over. Heck, even the voice actor for Cortana was carried over!

Cool I now whant it

also is there internet explorer on there?

> 
> Cool I now whant it
> also is there internet explorer on there?

Yes, however right now it has been named Project Spartan.
So they have gone all halo on it? Spartan cortana any other halo things on there?
IDK... also Spartan isn't just Halo, the Spartans were a greek civilization.

I know that but I was thinking because of cortana.

Is this a more stable version from what you can tell?

> 
> Cortana? Halo

Yea, they're milking it for everything it has.

> 
> I know that but I was thinking because of cortana.
> Is this a more stable version from what you can tell?

Yes... however sometimes while booting it up it has to restart... i suggest Virtual Box.
Why is there a power bar is it your ups if you have one?
I'm running it on a laptop
